name: Virus Valor
description:
Virus Valor is a puzzle game based on arcade games. You play as an ANTI-VIRUS knight who has to defeat viruses in a limited amount of time.

Green tiles with white outlines do not change.

Black tiles are harmful, be careful!

F5 key to reset the game. (Mostly for the download version.)

F4 key to go into fullscreen mode.

F3 key to change the screen size.

F2 key to view the FPS counter.

Control key to fast forward through text.

Shift key to run.

Feedback would be appreciated.
